mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_commodity (comId, comName, comQuantity, comQuantityNow, comEachPrice, comDescription, comPicture, comRate, comRateCount, utcCreate, utcModify, modifyBy, valid, remark, customa, customb) VALUE (#{comId}, #{comName}, #{comQuantity}, #{comQuantityNow}, #{comEachPrice}, #{comDescription}, '', 0, 0, #{utcCreate}, #{utcModify}, #{modifyBy}, 1, #{remark}, #{customa}, #{customb})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_commodity WHERE comQuantityNow = 0 AND comId IN ( SELECT comId FROM rel_user_commodity WHERE userName = #{userName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_commodity
comName = #{comName},
comQuantity = #{comQuantity},
comQuantityNow = #{comQuantityNow},
comEachPrice = #{comEachPrice},
comDescription = #{comDescription},
comPicture = #{comPicture},
utcCreate = #{utcCreate},
utcModify = #{utcModify},
modifyBy = #{modifyBy},
valid = #{valid},
remark = #{remark},
customa = #{customa},
customb = #{customb},
WHERE comId = #{comId}

UPDATE sys_commodity
comRate = #{comRate},
comRateCount = #{comRateCount},
WHERE comId = #{comId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_commodity WHERE comId = #{comId} AND valid = 1
SELECT * FROM sys_commodity WHERE comName like '%${comName}%' AND valid = 1
SELECT * FROM sys_commodity WHERE comQuantityNow <= #{comQuantityNow} AND valid = 1
